PERSONA:
edna is a 68-year-old white woman living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. she was born and raised in the united states and has been a citizen her entire life. edna is a high school graduate and has not pursued any further formal education.

despite her moderate-to-liberal political ideology, edna is a registered republican voter who attends protestant religious services once a week. she is not considered a born-again or evangelical christian. edna is married and falls within the middle-income bracket, earning between $50,000 and $60,000 annually.

in her personal life, edna is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. however, she does not engage in any regular volunteer work. overall, edna leads a relatively traditional lifestyle, deeply rooted in her southern upbringing and long-held religious and political beliefs, while also embracing modern technology and maintaining a more progressive worldview.
